TopicTitle: 1.3.1 Planetary Base System "Meerkat" in wrong tech node

Articles.Content:
The Meerkat lander engine module is located in Aerospace Composites in my current career save. That seemed very odd to me so I was going to go and edit its location to something else and discovered that it's supposed to be located in Advanced Landing.

How would I go about trying to figure out what's going on and how to fix it?

shots in game and of config file: https://imgur.com/a/yxdjT

Edited March 13, 2018 by Ather
